author: Aaron Weaver
title: Clueless Florida Governor DeSantis Should Attend Classes If He Reopens Schools
description: Florida Governor Ron DeSantis is considering reopening schools this year, giving us yet another reason to stay away from Florida. The politician seems dead-set on spreading coronavirus throughout the state. The post Clueless Florida Governor DeSantis Should A…
content:
• Florida Governor Ron DeSantis is considering reopening schools this year.
